author: Ralph Wood
title: Bears Grind Out A Win
text:
Bears Grind Out A Win - KMPH FOX 26 | Central San Joaquin Valley News Source Member Center: Bears Grind Out A Win Posted: rwood@kmph.com Fresno - 
The Buchanan High School football team got an early field goal from Mitch Souza then a touchdown run from Trevor Ervin on the way to a win over the Central Grizzlies Thursday night. The Bears held a 10-0 lead in the first half, and held on for a 17-13 victory. Buchanan improves to 4-2 while Central is 1-5. 
In other week six games, Reedley defeated Roosevelt, 42-19. Tulare Western topped Delano, 38-6. Porterville powered past Mission Oak, 61-35. Local News Local News More>> El Nino Still Headed Our Way!
